statement: He was surprised at his test score.
She walked slowly toward the door.
Fish live in the sea, and tigers live on land .
The air is cleaner up in the mountains.
Rain, river, oceans and lakes are made of water .
Children slide down the playground slide with joy.
Everyone clap their hands to the music.
She put her favorite photo in a wooden frame.
The boy played the drum in the school band.
